docs.snippet: Polling in Senate races is unpredictable, largely because a Republican or Democrat in one state may differ politically from one in another state....
docs.lead_paragraph: Polling in Senate races is unpredictable, largely because a Republican or Democrat in one state may differ politically from one in another state.
docs.abstract: Political Memo; Senate races around United States prove more difficult to forecast than presidential race; unpredictability is due to higher numbers of undecided voters, variability of polling quality and greater ability of candidates to define themselves according to state's values.

headline.main: Senate Forecasts Aren’t Obvious. Just Take a Look at Kansas.
headline.print_headline: Senate Forecasts Aren’t Obvious. Just Take a Look at Kansas.
